alert.note: Alert for Davis; Salt Lake; Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 17 at 6:01PM MDT until July 17 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM MDT FOR SALT LAKE...SOUTHERN DAVIS AND EAST CENTRAL TOOELE COUNTIES... At 601 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Great Salt Lake South of the Causeway to Camp Williams, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Salt Lake City, West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, Bountiful, Tooele, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, South Salt Lake, Herriman, North Salt Lake, Centerville, Woods Cross, Stansbury Park and Bluffdale. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 286 and 319. Interstate 80 in Utah between mile markers 94 and 125. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
